label: not given
description: No neoadjuvant therapy; No treatment before surgery; Surgical resection not part of first course of treatment plan; Autopsy only

label: completed
description: Neoadjuvant therapy completed according to treatment plan and guidelines

label: not completed
description: Neoadjuvant therapy started, but not completed OR unknown if completed

label: insufficient
description: Limited systemic exposure when the intent was not neoadjuvant; treatment did not meet the definition of neoadjuvant therapy

label: unknown
description: Not documented in medical record; Response to neoadjuvant therapy not assessed or unknown if assessed
